verses.verse: Knowest <WH3045> thou the time <WH6256> when the wild goats <WH3277> of the rock <WH5553> bring forth <WH3205>? Or canst thou mark <WH8104> when the hinds <WH355> do calve <WH2342>?
Canst thou number <WH5608> the months <WH3391> that they fulfil <WH4390>? Or knowest <WH3045> thou the time <WH6256> when they bring forth <WH3205>?
They bow <WH3766> themselves <WH6398>, they bring forth their young <WH3206>, They cast out <WH7971> their pains <WH2256>.
Their young ones <WH1121> become strong <WH2492>, they grow up <WH7235> in the open field <WH1250>; They go forth <WH3318>, and return not again <WH7725>.
Who hath sent out <WH7971> the wild ass <WH6501> free <WH2670>? Or who hath loosed <WH6605> the bonds <WH4147> of the swift ass <WH6171>,
Whose home <WH1004> I have made <WH7760> the wilderness <WH6160>, And the salt <WH4420> land his dwelling-place <WH4908>?
He scorneth <WH7832> the tumult <WH1995> of the city <WH7151>, Neither heareth <WH8085> he the shoutings <WH8663> of the driver <WH5065>.
The range <WH3491> of the mountains <WH2022> is his pasture <WH4829>, And he searcheth <WH1875> after <WH310> every green thing <WH3387>.
Will the wild-ox <WH7214> be content <WH14> to serve <WH5647> thee <WH3885>? Or will he abide by thy crib <WH18>?
Canst thou bind <WH7194> the wild-ox <WH7214> with his band <WH5688> in the furrow <WH8525>? Or will he harrow <WH7702> the valleys <WH6010> after thee <WH310>?
Wilt thou trust <WH982> him <WH3581>, because his strength is great <WH7227>? Or wilt thou leave <WH5800> to him thy labor <WH3018>?
Wilt thou confide <WH539> in him <WH7725>, that he will bring home thy seed <WH2233>, And gather <WH622> the grain of thy threshing-floor <WH1637>?
The wings <WH3671> of the ostrich <WH5965> wave proudly <WH7443>; But are they the pinions <WH84> and plumage <WH2624> of love <WH5133>?
For she leaveth <WH5800> her eggs <WH1000> on the earth <WH776>, And warmeth <WH2552> them in the dust <WH6083>,
And forgetteth <WH7911> that the foot <WH7272> may crush <WH2115> them <WH7704>, Or that the wild beast <WH2416> may trample them <WH1758>.
She dealeth hardly <WH7188> with her young ones <WH1121>, as if they were not <WH3808> hers <WH3018>: Though her labor be in vain <WH7385>, she is without fear <WH6343>;
Because God <WH433> hath deprived <WH5382> her of wisdom <WH2451>, Neither hath he imparted <WH2505> to her understanding <WH998>.
What time <WH6256> she lifteth up <WH4754> herself on high <WH4791>, She scorneth <WH7832> the horse <WH5483> and his rider <WH7392>.
Hast thou given <WH5414> the horse <WH5483> his might <WH1369>? Hast thou clothed <WH3847> his neck <WH6677> with the quivering mane <WH7483>?
Hast thou made him to leap <WH7493> as a locust <WH697>? The glory <WH1935> of his snorting <WH5170> is terrible <WH367>.
He paweth <WH2658> in the valley <WH6010>, and rejoiceth <WH7797> in his strength <WH3581>: He goeth out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> the armed men <WH5402>.
He mocketh <WH7832> at fear <WH6343>, and is not dismayed <WH2865>; Neither turneth he back <WH7725> from <WH6440> the sword <WH2719>.
The quiver <WH827> rattleth <WH7439> against him <WH3851>, The flashing spear <WH2595> and the javelin <WH3591>.
He swalloweth <WH1572> the ground <WH776> with fierceness <WH7494> and rage <WH7267>; Neither believeth <WH539> he that it is the voice <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>.

As oft as the trumpet <WH7782> soundeth <WH1767> he saith <WH559>, Aha <WH1889>! <WH1889> And he smelleth <WH7306> the battle <WH4421> afar off <WH7350>, The thunder <WH7482> of the captains <WH8269>, and the shouting <WH8643>.
Is it by thy wisdom <WH998> that the hawk <WH5322> soareth <WH82>, (And <WH6566>) stretcheth her wings <WH3671> toward the south <WH8486>?
Is it at thy command <WH6310> that the eagle <WH5404> mounteth up <WH1361>, And maketh <WH7311> her nest <WH7064> on high <WH7311>?
On the cliff <WH5553> she dwelleth <WH7931>, and maketh her home <WH3885>, Upon the point <WH5553> of the cliff <WH8127>, and the stronghold <WH4686>.
From thence she spieth <WH2658> out the prey <WH400>; Her eyes <WH5869> behold <WH5027> it afar off <WH7350>.
Her young ones <WH667> also suck up <WH5966> blood <WH1818>: And where the slain <WH2491> are <WH1931>, there is she.
